name: Bazilonius Map
description:
This is a set of hand drawn maps created by Horos. There are two watercolor versions and a black and white PDF you can print.

Beware, brave adventurers! These lands are full of treasures and threats!

Try to survive the natural hazards of this dangerous territory and explore its points of interest infested by monsters, undead, and nameless aberrations of legends old!

This map was drawn by Bazilonius, a hidden priest living in the Citadel of the Mad Slavelords.
